classification_data.text: EL SUSCRITO REVISOR FISCAL DE LA SOCIEDAD COTEL S.A.S NIT .800.122.811-2 CERTIFICA QUE: De acuerdo con el Acta No. 063 de la Asamblea General Ordinaria de Accionistas de Cotel S.A.S de fecha marzo 29 de 2022, la nueva composición accionaria quedó registrada así: Accionista | Documento Identificación | No. de Acciones | % de Participación James Herney Quijano Morán | 16.758.096 | 5.740.000.000 | 82% María del Pilar Zuluaga Marín | 66.901.361 | 700.000.000 | 10% Nicolle Dayana Quijano Zuluaga | 1.107.089.788 | 210.000.000 | 3% Juan Pablo Quijano Zuluaga | 1.144.109.912 | 210.000.000 | 3% Cotel S.A.S | 800.122.811-2 | 140.000.000 | 2% Total | | 7.000.000.000 | 100% La nueva composición accionaria fue registrada en los libros contables, así mismo fue actualizado el libro de Registro de Accionistas. La presente certificación se expide en Santiago de Cali a los cinco (05) días del mes de febrero de 2024. Gustavo Adolfo Luna Salazar Revisor Fiscal TP No. 77391-T Miembro de Bloodhound Consulting Group SAS www.cotel.com.co

content.thinking: Let me analyze this document step by step according to the classification workflow: 1. **TEXT EXTRACTION** Looking at the document, I can see: - Header: "EL SUSCRITO REVISOR FISCAL DE LA SOCIEDAD COTEL S.A.S NIT .800.122.811-2" - "CERTIFICA QUE:" - A table showing shareholder composition with columns for "Accionista", "Documento Identificación", "No. de Acciones", "% de Participación" - Shareholders listed: James Herney Quijano Morán (82%), María del Pilar Zuluaga Marín (10%), Nicolle Dayana Quijano Zuluaga (3%), Juan Pablo Quijano Zuluaga (3%), Cotel S.A.S (2%) - Total shares: 7.000.000.000 (100%) - Text about the new shareholding composition being registered in accounting books - Certificate issued in Santiago de Cali on February 5, 2024 - Signed by Gustavo Adolfo Luna Salazar, Fiscal Auditor 2. **PRIORITY CHECKS** This is not BLANK - there's substantial meaningful content This is not LINK_ONLY - no hyperlinks or URLs redirecting to external sources 3. **DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS** What is the MAIN PURPOSE of this document? - This document shows the shareholding composition of a company (COTEL S.A.S) - It shows percentage participation (82%, 10%, 3%, 3%, 2%) - It shows number of shares for each shareholder - It's certifying the new shareholding composition after an Ordinary General Shareholders Meeting This is clearly ACC indicative - it shows shareholding composition with percentages and number of shares. 4. **ISSUER IDENTIFICATION** - This is issued by a "Revisor Fiscal" (Fiscal Auditor) of the company COTEL S.A.S - The document is a corporate certification of ownership structure - Issued internally by the company's fiscal representative - Confirms current shareholder details and their respective stakes 5. **CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION** I'm examining the document's classification carefully, ruling out other potential document types systematically. The fiscal auditor's certification clearly points to an internal corporate accounting document, not a government-issued identification or registry document.
